AboutMe:
I have been an electronics enthusiast and a DIY practitioner since I was 15. I have also a good affiliation with programming and its interface with hardware. Following are some of my experiences.

Hardware Programming:

 1---Arduino programming
    -Specifically its interface with mainframe PCs.
    -Data logging and connectivity shields(ethernet etc).
    -Basic robotic and motor control.
 2---PIC programming
    -MikroC
    -Different BASIC stamps.
    -Interface with LCDs and 7 segments.
 3---Atmel's AVR
    -Optimized C programming language.

Pure Programming:

1---Python programming.
    -Serial Communication.
    -GUI programming with tkinter.
    -Game developement with pygame.
    -Network programming using different modules.
2---C/C++ programming.
    -Basic problem handling.
    -Algorithms and recipes up to intermediate level.
3---"Processing"
    -Hardware interface with Serial communication.
    -Basic 2D/3D models.
    -Basic animations.
